attributes.title: Apollo Food International Inc Issues Allergy Alert on Undeclared Eggs In “Mini Roll”
attributes.description: Apollo Food International Inc. of Long Island City, NY, is recalling its 2.469 ounce packages of “Mini Roll” food treats because they may contain undeclared eggs. Consumers who are allergic to eggs may run the risk of serious or life-threatening allergic reactions if they consume this product.
